title: Creates management/confidential organizational act
summary: Creates management/confidential organizational act to promote the efficient and effective administration of employer designated state programs; enacts provisions relating to the recognition of designated employee organizations; open communication between the state and managerial/confidential employee organizations; and providing employees notice of their rights.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the effect of deductions for excluded employee organizational dues and fair share fee deductions use for employment
